document_data.name: Song of Battle
document_data.mainbody: '''''Song of battle''''' was an [[Elven High Magic]] [[wizard]] [[spell]].
document_data.Effects: This ancient [[elven]] chant was used to encourage their armies during battle. Every ally within the spell's range was filled with courage and bravery to the point where regular and even magical ''[[fear]]'' or other such effects were useless against them.
document_data.Components: In addition to [[Verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component|somatic]] components, this spell required as a [[material component]] a [[harp]] or [[lute]] that the caster had to play to cast.
